headline: Tradr Debuts Leveraged ETFs on BLSH, DASH, FLY, IREN, NEM, OPEN, QS, SRPT & WULF
summary: Tradr ETFs, a provider of ETFs designed for sophisticated investors and professional traders, today launched nine new single stock leveraged ETFs, seven of which are first-to-market strategies. The funds, all listed on Cboe, seek to deliver twice (200%) the daily performance of a specific underlying stock.

content.title: Tradr Debuts Leveraged ETFs on BLSH, DASH, FLY, IREN, NEM, OPEN, QS, SRPT & WULF
content.summary: Tradr ETFs, a provider of ETFs designed for sophisticated investors and professional traders, today launched nine new single stock leveraged ETFs, seven of which are first-to-market strategies. The funds, all listed on Cboe, seek to deliver twice (200%) the daily performance of a specific underlying stock.

headline: Inflation Data, P&G Earnings: What to Watch for Thursday and Friday
summary: The U.S. government shutdown continues, but investors won't be completely starved for economic data. Friday brings a delayed look at September’s consumer-price index, a key inflation reading that will factor into the Federal Reserve’s next decision on interest rates.

content.title: Inflation Data, P&G Earnings: What to Watch for Thursday and Friday
content.summary: The U.S. government shutdown continues, but investors won't be completely starved for economic data. Friday brings a delayed look at September’s consumer-price index, a key inflation reading that will factor into the Federal Reserve’s next decision on interest rates.

headline: Gold Price Rebounds After Sharp Selloff. J.P. Morgan Says It Can Hit $6,000.
summary: The price of gold rebounded Wednesday despite investor caution after a sharp selloff over the past two days.  Gold  futures contracts were up 2.3% to $4,159.70 an ounce.  Earlier in the session, gold was down after the largest single-day outflow from gold-backed exchange-traded funds in five months, MUFG analyst Soojin Kim wrote.

content.title: Gold Price Rebounds After Sharp Selloff. J.P. Morgan Says It Can Hit $6,000.
content.summary: The price of gold rebounded Wednesday despite investor caution after a sharp selloff over the past two days.  Gold  futures contracts were up 2.3% to $4,159.70 an ounce.  Earlier in the session, gold was down after the largest single-day outflow from gold-backed exchange-traded funds in five months, MUFG analyst Soojin Kim wrote.

headline: Newmont: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: DENVER (AP) — Newmont Corporation (NEM) on Thursday reported third-quarter profit of $1.83 billion. On a per-share basis, the Denver-based company said it had profit of $1.67. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were $1.71 per share.

content.title: Newmont: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: DENVER (AP) — Newmont Corporation (NEM) on Thursday reported third-quarter profit of $1.83 billion. On a per-share basis, the Denver-based company said it had profit of $1.67. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were $1.71 per share.

headline: Why Newmont (NEM) Is Down 7.0% After Gold’s Largest Daily Drop in a Decade and What’s Next
summary: Gold experienced its largest one-day loss in over a decade this past week, causing shares of major gold miners such as Newmont to fall as precious metal prices declined sharply from record highs. This pronounced volatility highlights gold's shifting behavior, at times moving more like a risk asset than a traditional safe-haven investment during periods of market uncertainty. We'll assess how this dramatic gold price drop may influence Newmont's investment narrative, especially its outlook on...

content.summary: Gold experienced its largest one-day loss in over a decade this past week, causing shares of major gold miners such as Newmont to fall as precious metal prices declined sharply from record highs.
